name: "Casita" on the Water
description:
At Constitution Marina's Bed & Breakfast Afloat you can enjoy the ambiance, the comfort, the romance of staying ON THE WATER with all the amenities of a modern hotel, at rates as low as you'll find anywhere in Boston!

The space
Single Stateroom

Casita provides the unique perspective of a floating hotel room. The cozy houseboat includes a queen bed with an en-suite bath. Casita has an inviting private deck with a table and colorful Adirondack chairs, and is surrounded by flowers. Relax and enjoy the breathtaking views of Bostonâ€™s beautiful skyline.

Houseboat Amenities:
Breakfast is included
A/C and Heat
Cable Television and Wifi
Refrigerator
Coffee Maker, Hair Dryer, Iron

Other things to note
